description: Blockchain Brunch & Bubbles - Hashlock Edition Venue update: Migas Hong Kong, H Queens, 3F, H Queen's, 80 Queen's Road Central, Central. We are over capacity for tomorrow - First come, first serve! Skip the Consensus chaos and plug into the real Web3 conversation. We re hosting an invite-only brunch in Hong Kong for a curated mix of founders, builders, and investors who prefer substance over spectacle. No panels, no slides, just premium food, free flow alcohol and the kind of high-signal chats you usually only get in private rooms. What to Expect: Brunch Bubbles Join us at one of Hong Kong s most upcoming venues for high end food and chilled bubbles. High-Quality Connections Insightful conversation with our handpicked group of Builders, VCs, and founders. No-Slides, No Panels, No-Agenda This is a connections first room. Come to chat, share insights, and get to know each other. Intimate & Exclusive Venue A sleek Hong Kong space with serious atmosphere, built for premium conversations over a few drinks. Date: 11 February - 11am (GMT 8) Location: Shared with confirmed guests only Attendance is limited and by approval only. Full venue details will be shared exclusively with confirmed guests. If you re looking for real connections, great vibes, and some high end food, this is the one. Presented by: Hashlock Hashlock is the industry leading blockchain cybersecurity and smart contract auditing firm. We specialise in manual analysis led security research, securing bi...
